name: Arrivals + Departures
description:
We see the world differently. Inspired by travel and the journeys we take with each other and our clients, the A+D name drives us to always arrive at rigorous strategic insights and brilliant creative solutions while leaving well-worn paths in a departure from traditional thinking. 
We partnered with Blammo Worldwide in 2016 to form A+D and push the boundaries of what we’re capable of offering clients. We are a leading independent Canadian creative agency with offices in Toronto and Halifax.
